thread.title: I haven’t been having sex but I get horny – Rihanna
thread.title_full: I haven’t been having sex but I get horny – Rihanna

title: I haven’t been having sex but I get horny – Rihanna
text:
Date: 08-10-2015 Time: 05:10:15:pm Rihanna 
Rihanna once dated Chris Brown and Drake but admitted she isn’t the type that have sex regularly, but do get horny because she’s woman. 
Speaking in the November issue of Vanity Fair magazine, the ‘BBHMM’ hitmaker said: ‘I haven’t been having sex or even really seeing anybody. I don’t want to wake up the next day feeling guilty. 
‘I mean I get horny, I’m human, I’m a woman, I want to have sex. But what am I going to do – just find the first random cute dude that I think is going to be a great ride for the night and then tomorrow I wake up feeling empty and hollow?’ 
The singer in recent months has been romantically linked to a number of high-profile stars including actor Leonardo DiCaprio, footballer Karim Benzema and formula1 champion Lewis Hamilton.
